name: William SMITH; Gregory Thomas; Hugh Williams; Gary Kretchmar, Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania; Edward G. Rendell, In his Official Capacity as Governor of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania; Tom Corbett, Attorney General of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania; Pennsylvania Board of Pardons, Appellees

parties: William SMITH; Gregory Thomas; Hugh Williams; Gary Kretchmar, Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania; Edward G. Rendell, In his Official Capacity as Governor of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania; Tom Corbett, Attorney General of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania; Pennsylvania Board of Pardons, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of March, 2010, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
991 A.2d 306
William SMITH; Gregory Thomas; Hugh Williams; Gary Kretchmar, Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania; Edward G. Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 24, 2010.
